original_title: ‘Daddy’ Trump and Western Europe’s oath of allegiance — RT World News
article_summary: US abstains from condemning Russia for the 2008 Georgia war at the UN, breaking past practices. The Georgian PM blames the previous regime for the conflict, while the current government is criticized for strained relations with the US. Meanwhile, Russian President Vladimir Putin is open to meeting Ukrainian President Zelensky once all issues related to the conflict are resolved.</s>
